item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! This is my personal website, meant to be a reference for the projects that I have worked on in the past. It’s a bit empty, as I haven’t done many projects yet. I’ll try to think up something more clever using Markdown for this description when I get the chance. Right now, I am studying computer science at Boston University. Previously, I worked at a startup called ProPhone (now Topline Pro (YC W21)), where I helped service professionals to grow their businesses online.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects Link to heading What I’ve worked on Link to heading This is a list of some of the projects I’ve worked on in the past. HackHarvard Link to heading October 2022 Project link A project where I built a wiki page usind Django, as well as an AI chatbot with Flask.
